# Syllables of Cantonese for the Yale romanization system.

column2: Virginia Yip: Cantonese: A Comprehensive Grammar.
Gerard P. Kok: Speak Cantonese (Book I). Revised

column1: # Cantonese Yale syllables were derived from the JyutpingSyllable table using
# the JyutpingYaleMapping table for all initials and for finals mentioned in the
# source 'Speak Cantonese'. For reference the syllables can be obtained by the
# following SQL command: SELECT CantoneseYale FROM JyutpingYaleMapping;
